name: Kibera
title: Insatiable Blade

uniqueWeapon.name: UW name
effect:
Selects one of the Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil and earns one of the following effects:
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 200, ACC by 200, and DMG of normal attacks by 20%.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Recovers Mana by 80 every sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases own ATK by 10% and Crit DMG by 10% every 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremoveable.

Selects one of the Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil and earns one of the following effects:
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 240, ACC by 240, and DMG of normal attacks by 24%.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Recovers Mana by 96 every sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases own ATK by 12% and Crit DMG by 12% every 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremoveable.

Selects one of the Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil and earns one of the following effects:
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 290, ACC by 290, and DMG of normal attacks by 29%.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Recovers Mana by 115 every sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases own ATK by 14% and Crit DMG by 14% every 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremoveable.

Selects one of the Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil and earns one of the following effects:
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 350, ACC by 350, and DMG of normal attacks by 35%.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Recovers Mana by 138 every sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases own ATK by 17% and Crit DMG by 17% every 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremoveable.

Selects one of the Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil and earns one of the following effects:
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 420, ACC by 420, and DMG of normal attacks by 42%.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Recovers Mana by 165 every sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases own ATK by 21% and Crit DMG by 21% every 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremoveable.

Selects one of the Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil and earns one of the following effects:
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 500, ACC by 500, and DMG of normal attacks by 50%.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Recovers Mana by 200 every sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases own ATK by 25% and Crit DMG by 25% every 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremoveable.

soulWeapon.advancement0:
Summons the soul of Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil, launching a blow to all enemies within wide frontal range of self that deals ??? M.DMG, inflicting Stun for [X] sec, and reducing their Mana by [x]. Afterward, increases own ATK by [X]% for [X] sec and deals a total of ??? M.DMG to [?] over [X] hits every [X] sec. Additional effects will be applied depending on Kibera's selected sword.
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases DMG dealt to enemies by [X]% for [X] sec.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Reduces ATK of hit enemies by [X]% for [X] sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - DMG ignores DEF.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by [X] sec and increases DMG by [X]%.
soulWeapon.advancement2: Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by an additional [X] sec and dispels positive effects of the target.

skillInfo.name: Mm, You Better Pay Attention!
skillInfo.description:
Attacks an enemy 11 times, dealing a total of ??? M.DMG. Afterwards, summons a [Dark Whirlpool] for 4 sec that attack the target and nearby enemies 8 times, dealing a total of ??? M.DMG.
If [Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] is selected, DMG of self's normal attacks increases by 50% and each normal attack reduces Cooldown of this Skill by 0.5 sec.

skills.dark: Gains Immunity to CC for the duration of the Skill.

uniqueTreasure.name: Unused Pipe
effect: [Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases DMG by 20%. Every time Kibera hits an enemy with normal attacks or [Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases own Crit DMG by 1%. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.

[Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases DMG by 20%. Every time Kibera hits an enemy with normal attacks or [Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases own Crit DMG by 1.2%. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.

[Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases DMG by 20%. Every time Kibera hits an enemy with normal attacks or [Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases own Crit DMG by 1.4%. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.

[Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases DMG by 20%. Every time Kibera hits an enemy with normal attacks or [Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases own Crit DMG by 1.7%. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.

[Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases DMG by 20%. Every time Kibera hits an enemy with normal attacks or [Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases own Crit DMG by 2.1%. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.

[Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases DMG by 20%. Every time Kibera hits an enemy with normal attacks or [Mm, You Better Pay Attention!] Increases own Crit DMG by 2.5%. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.

skillInfo.name: Heh, Let's Have Some Fun!
skillInfo.description:
Dispels all negative effects from self and turns into [Show Dominion] state for 5 sec. While in [Shadow Dominion] state, ATK is increased by ??? and HP does not fall below 10%. After Skill use, [Ha! Full of Openings!] can be used within 5 sec.
If [Umbral Demonic Sword, Dark Shadow] is selected, the Mana Cost of this Skill is reduced by 1.

skillInfo.name: Ha! Full of Openings
skillInfo.description:
Moves to the back of the enemy with the highest ATK, marking the target with [Dark Corrosion] and reducing the ATK Spd of the marked target by 500 for 10 sec. Kibera's attacks will prioritize the marked target.
If [Umbral Demonic Sword, Dark Shadow] is selected, enemies inflicted with [Dark Corrosion] cannot receive positive effects, and have their Mana reduced by 250 every 1 sec.

skills.light: Upon using [Ha! Full of Openings], inflicts silence on all enemies for 2 sec.
skills.dark: When there are [X] allies or less, the effect of [Shadow Dominion] applies to all allies.

effect:
[Heh, Let's Have Some Fun!] Reduces Mana Cost by 1.
[Ha! Full of Openings] After movement, gains immunity to CC for 2 sec.

skillInfo.name: Say Hello to Death!!
skillInfo.description:
Sticks [Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] into the ground, creating a shockwave that deals ??? M.DMG to nearby enemies in a circular range of self and inflicts Stun for 5 sec. Afterward, for 10 sec, unloads [Dark Thunder] to a random enemy every 2 sec, dealing ??? M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 0.5 sec.
If [Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] is selected, the Mana Cost of all Skills increases by 1, but DMG inflicted by this Skill will ignore DEF and the Heal Rate of enemies hit by [Dark Thunder] will be reduced by 50% for 5 sec.

skills.light: Dispels positive effects of enemies within the range of the shockwave.
skills.dark: Increases Mana Cost by 1, and icnreases DMG by 100%.

uniqueTreasure.name: Special Mana Oil
effect: [Say Hello to Death!!] Increases DMG by 20% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of the Skill.
[Say Hello to Death!!] Increases DMG by 24% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of the Skill.
[Say Hello to Death!!] Increases DMG by 29% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of the Skill.
[Say Hello to Death!!] Increases DMG by 35% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of the Skill.
[Say Hello to Death!!] Increases DMG by 42% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of the Skill.
[Say Hello to Death!!] Increases DMG by 50% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of the Skill.

skillInfo.name: Three Demonic Swords
skillInfo.description:
At the beginning of the first Battle, Kibera can select a demonic sword. He gains immunity to CC until he selects his sword, but he cannot recover mana during that period. Once he selects a sword, his stats and the effect of a skill will be enhanced depending on the selected sword.
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 300 and enhances the effect of [Mm, You Better Pay Attention].
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Increases DEF by ??? and enhances the effect of [Heh, Let's Have Some Fun!] and [Ha! Full of Openings].
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases ATK by ??? and enhances the effect of [Say Hello to Death!!].

skills.light: Increaes own ATK by 20% and automatically selects [Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] at the beginning of the first Battle.
skills.dark: Recovers own Mana by 150 every sec, and automatically selects [Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] at the beginning of the first battle.
books: Increases ATK and DEF boost by 10%.
Increases ATK and DEF boost by 15%.
Increases ATK and DEF boost by 25%.

uniqueTreasure.name: Haunted Scroll
effect:

[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd of all allies by 100 for 30 sec.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Reduces All DMG all allies take by 10% for 30 sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - Increases ATK of all allies by 10% for 30 sec. If there are 3 or less allies, all effects multiply by 2 times.
